title: Annual Day Celebration 2024
content: We are delighted to invite all parents and guardians to the Annual Day Celebration on 15th March 2024 at the school auditorium. The event will showcase student performances and achievements.

title: Admission Open for 2024-25
content: Applications are now being accepted for admission to Classes Nursery to IX for the academic year 2024-25. Visit the admission office or download forms from our website.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting Schedule
content: Parent-Teacher meetings for all classes will be held on 20th February 2024. Parents are requested to collect their ward's progress report and discuss academic performance.

title: Science Exhibition Winners
content: Congratulations to all participants of the Inter-School Science Exhibition. Our students secured First Position in the senior category and Second Position in the junior category.

title: Winter Vacation Notice
content: The school will remain closed for winter vacation from 23rd December to 5th January. Regular classes will resume on 6th January 2024.

title: Sports Day Announcement
content: The Annual Sports Day will be held on 28th January 2024. All students are encouraged to participate in various athletic events. Practice sessions begin next week.
